elements.description: Initialize the Zendesk SDK
elements.name: zendesk.initialize

elements.description: Set a callback for events from the Zendesk SDK
elements.name: zendesk.set_callback

elements.description: Show the conversation screen.
elements.name: zendesk.show_messaging

elements.description: Set conversation fields in the SDK to add contextual data about the conversation.
elements.name: zendesk.set_conversation_fields

elements.description: Clear conversation fields from the SDK storage when the client side context changes.
elements.name: zendesk.clear_conversation_fields

elements.description: Set custom conversation tags in the SDK to add contextual data about the conversation.
elements.name: zendesk.set_conversation_tags

elements.description: Clear conversation tags from SDK storage when the client side context changes.
elements.name: zendesk.clear_conversation_tags

elements.description: Authenticate a user.
elements.name: zendesk.login

elements.description: Unauthenticate a user.
elements.name: zendesk.logout

elements.description: An error was detected while initializing the Zendesk SDK
elements.name: MSG_INIT_ERROR

elements.description: The Zendesk SDK has been initialized successfully
elements.name: MSG_INIT_SUCCESS

elements.description: An internal error occured
elements.name: MSG_INTERNAL_ERROR

elements.description: An generic error occured
elements.name: MSG_ERROR

elements.description: The number of unread messages has changed
elements.name: MSG_UNREAD_MESSAGE_COUNT_CHANGED

elements.description: A REST call failed for authentication reasons
elements.name: MSG_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED

elements.description: Validation checks failed for conversation fields
elements.name: MSG_FIELD_VALIDATION_FAILED

elements.description: Login was successful
elements.name: MSG_LOGIN_SUCCESS

elements.description: Login failed
elements.name: MSG_LOGIN_FAILED

elements.description: Logout was successful
elements.name: MSG_LOGOUT_SUCCESS

elements.description: Logout failed
elements.name: MSG_LOGOUT_FAILED

info.description: Defold native extension to interact with the Zendesk SDK.
info.name: extension-zendesk
